descriptionNullable:
What information is included in a sales analysis dataset?

Sales information: This includes sales volume, sales amount, order date, payment date, cancellation status, etc.
Customer information: This includes customer name, segment information, contact information, purchase history, etc.
Product information: This includes product name, category information, brand information, inventory status, price, etc.
Time information: This includes sales date, month, week, year, etc.
How can sales analysis datasets be used?

Sales analysis datasets can be used to answer a variety of business questions, such as:

Which products are selling the most?
Which customers are the most valuable?
When are sales better?
How can the effectiveness of different marketing campaigns be measured?
title: Sales_Data_Analysis
